strings.Value: "I came from Restov. Aldori Swordlords have sent me to kill the Stag Lord".

{n}He looks at you with subtle revulsion, as if you were a beggar.{/n} "Well, well, a new face in our back-country. Nice to meet you. I am Bartholomew Delgado, an independent scholar of magic and a very busy man. And who might be you? How can we be useful to each other?"
"You again? I hope you have a good reason to disturb me".
"Really? Ha-ha-ha? well... Good luck in your noble pursuit. Now, what does it have to do with me? There are no quarrels between me and the Stag Lord".

"I'm afraid, the uninitiated would find it hard to understand... Let me put it this way: these lands are home to some very unusual creatures. Kobolds, wyverns... Trolls. I observe them in the wild and study their supernatural abilities".
"Yes, they are mine. I don't like it when various miscreants wander around my house and interrupt me while I'm working... I'm talking about the trolls, of course."
"Let's see... I think I'll find something."
"Looks like I'll have to teach you a lesson..."
